Name: Myristica
About the game: XUM studios' singleplayer horror game Myristica takes you to West India. After a day of river fishing you unluckily run out of gas. Your only hope is to search in the ancient endangered swamp at night. Can you make it out alive before the 'local wildlife' find you? Features • Horrific Atmosphere - This once thriving ecosystem is now fading into darkness, and so are its inhabitants. The now rotting swamp has spawned a flesh-crazed horror. • Intuitive Puzzles - Follow the bread crumbs around you. Can you find a way out under pressure, or will you misjudge your environment? • Frantic Survival - Use your reaction time and cleverness to escape death. Trust your instincts to keep you on the right path.
